display_help: You strike your target with a forceful blow that strikes at their very soul. The affected target suffers energy and negative energy damage, along with reduced defenses. Flying targets are knocked to the ground. Additionally, the target may be knocked down.
display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Energy/Negative Energy), -DEF(Foe, All), -Fly(Foe), Chance for Knockdown
display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced and you are unable to fly.
